description:
Don’t let the cold keep you off your bike. Balancing the warmth of mittens with the dexterity of gloves, the T1 Warm Waterproof Revolution gloves keep you and your digits happy on frigid rides. By nesting your fingers together in pairs, these gloves don’t make you sacrifice coziness for control.

  • Waterproof nylon shell material keeps the elements right where they should be
  • Soft polyester microfleece lining wicks away moisture while trapping warm air
  • Pre-curved fingers encourage a natural grip on the bars
  • Silicone print on the palms and fingers keep you connected to your cockpit
  • Soft terry nose wipe, because sniffles never miss a cold ride
  • Deep cuff and elasticised gauntlet keep the cold air from creeping in
  • Reflective strip across the knuckles keeps you seen
name: MEC T1 Warm Waterproof Revolution Over-Mitt - Unisex
